profile_summary:
As a skilled Backend Developer with 8 years of experience, I excel in building scalable solutions using **PHP**, APIs, and various **databases**. My technical expertise includes **Docker** for containerization, ensuring clean code principles, and managing **messaging brokers** for efficient data handling. I have a strong track record in end-to-end development, particularly within the healthcare and financial sectors, where I have led projects utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** technologies.

In addition to my core backend skills, I possess hands-on experience with modern frameworks such as **React**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, which I leverage for developing high-performance applications. My familiarity with cloud services like **Azure** and **AWS** enables me to implement robust solutions that meet compliance standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am also adept in collaborative environments and possess strong communication skills that facilitate teamwork and project success.
